src:
Pokončali devet mormonov
Je bil pokol maščevanje zaradi kritiziranja kriminalnih združb? Žrtve so imele dvojno, ameriško in mehiško državljanstvo.
07 Nov 2019, 21:15 by E. B.
RANCHO DE LA MORA – Tri ženske in šest otrok je po neuradnih podatkih umrlo v obračunu, za katerega naj bi bil odgovoren mamilarski kartel. Vse žrtve naj bi bile iz družine LeBaron, ki je del mormonske skupnosti, oblasti pa ne izključujejo možnosti, da je deveterica morda umrla celo po pomoti.Kot poročajo tuji mediji, je petim otrokom uspelo pobegniti, enega pa še pogrešajo, menda deklico, ki naj bi pobegnila v gozd, po nekaterih podatkih pa naj bi bilo smrtnih žrtev pet: odrasla ženska in štirje otroci. Tri matere in otroci naj bi v konvoju vozil potovali iz mehiške zvezne države Sonora v Chihuaho, napadalci pa so žrtve iz še neznanega razloga ustrelili in vozila potem zažgali.
Napadalci so žrtve ustrelili, vozila pa zažgali.
Okrutni obračun se je zgodil v mestu Rancho de la Mora blizu meje z ZDA, kjer vlada kriminal vseh vrst, brutalneži pa so se morda spravili nad matere z otroki tudi zaradi maščevanja. Julian LeBaron, bratranec ene od odraslih žrtev, je namreč glasen kritik kriminalnih združb, tudi njegovega brata Benjamina, ustanovitelja skupine za boj proti kriminalu SOS Chihuahua, so leta 2009 umorili.Žrtve so bile del skupnosti potomcev mormonov, ki so v 19. stoletju pobegnili iz ZDA, kjer so jih preganjali zaradi verskih prepričanj in spornih tradicij. Številni mormoni v Mehiki imajo dvojno, mehiško in ameriško državljanstvo.

Nine Mormons killed
Was the massacre revenge for criticizing criminal organizations? The victims had dual, American and Mexican citizenship.
07 Nov 2019, 21:15 by E.B.
RANCHO DE LA MORA - According to unofficial data, three women and six children have died in a charge alleged to be the responsibility of a drug cartel. All of the victims are from the LeBaron family, which is part of the Mormon community, and authorities do not rule out the possibility that the nine may have died even by mistake. She is said to have fled to the woods, and according to some, there are five deaths: an adult woman and four children. Three mothers and children were reportedly traveling in a convoy of vehicles from the Mexican state of Sonora to Chihuahua, and the gunmen shot and killed the victims for some unknown reason.
The attackers shot the victims and set the vehicles on fire.
The brutal showdown happened in the town of Rancho de la Mora near the border with the United States, where crime of all kinds prevails, and brutal men may have quarreled over mothers with children for revenge. Julian LeBaron, a cousin of one of the adult victims, was a vocal critic of criminal organizations, including his brother Benjamin, founder of the SOS Chihuahua crime group, murdered in 2009. The victims were part of a community of Mormon descendants who fled in the 19th century. from the United States, where they were persecuted for religious beliefs and controversial traditions. Many Mormons in Mexico have dual, Mexican and US citizenship.
